title: resigned myself to a lifetime
extract: "resign yourself to something" in American English. resign yourself to something. — phrasal verb with resign us ​ /rɪˈzɑɪn/ verb [ I/T ] to make yourself accept something unpleasant that cannot be changed: He was resigned to living alone.
extract_html: "resign yourself to something" in American English. resign yourself to something. — phrasal verb with resign us ​ /rɪˈzɑɪn/ verb [ I/T ] to make yourself accept something unpleasant that cannot be changed: He was resigned to living alone.
